reviewtext: These are better than $20 headphones, and worse than $80 headphones.Pros:- Decent sound- Long cable, easy to plug into far-away things- Great as headphones for the gym, if you're not into earbuds. Lightweight, pretty sturdy, and stay on your head well. Best of all, they don't get too sweaty.Cons:- After a couple years of light use, ear pads will wear out and start shedding little bits of black crud. Replacement ear pads cost $6 to $12.- Poor at blocking out external sounds, since they don't cover the entire ear. They'd be lousy for office use, since they offer no real isolation.
